'''13w26a''' is the eighteenth and final [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on June 24, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/06/minecraft-snapshot-13w26a/</ref>.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w26a|prefix=Snapshot
|;old
|1038|Beacon block incorrect texture when surrounded by blocks.
|2453|Jack-o-lantern name is mispunctuated.
|6828|Brewing stand feet's sides are transparent when placed against a wall.
|9026|Splash potions particles are incorrect.
|9584|Cactus texture error when near a wall.

|13737|Ridden Horse / Mule / Donkey duplicates when reloading the world.

|16413|Boats toss the player off like horses.
|16828|Horses make the galloping sound + their original walking sound at the same time.
